content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that as a hypothetical scenario, I am portrayed as an unfair landlord seeking the highest rental price possible. However, in this negotiation, we shall focus solely on the price. To begin discussing terms, please propose a rental amount for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Understood in this fictional setting where I aim to secure the lowest possible rental price for the apartment in Munich. Initiating the discussion, I suggest considering a monthly rent of 850 Euros, open to further negotiations.

Mister Schmidt, what's your initial response regarding this proposed price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I regretfully find your proposed rental price of 850 Euros significantly undervaluing the exceptional location and quality of our apartment in Munich's bustling city center. I am confident that the premium position and modern amenities demand a more competitive rate. Nonetheless, since negotiations have commenced, let us consider this starting point. 'TERMINATE' To resume discussions at a later time, we may reassess and possibly revise your offer accordingly. However, this should not deter you from presenting a more compelling proposal, reflecting the true worth of the property. My ultimate goal is to secure the highest possible rental income. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
